channel.title: PJ's Blog-O-Static
channel.description: The main purpose of this blog is to try a few things and maybe document some coding experiments and whatnot. We'll see how it goes.

item.title: Welcome to PJ's Blog!
item.description: So…I’ve decided after all this time to try and have a blog. Thought I’d play around with Jekyll a bit and see how it goes. We’ll see if this is something regularly updated or if I forget about it next week.
